definitions.definition: The base with respect to which a congruence is computed .
The absolute value of a complex number .
A coefficient that expresses how much of a certain property is possessed by a certain substance .
A scalar field controlling the shape and size of extra dimensions in a compactification .
An operator placed between two numbers, to get the remainder of the division of those numbers.

main_definition: ( mathematics ) The base with respect to which a congruence is computed .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) The absolute value of a complex number .
( physics ) A coefficient that expresses how much of a certain property is possessed by a certain substance .
( physics ) A scalar field controlling the shape and size of extra dimensions in a compactification .
( computing , programming ) An operator placed between two numbers, to get the remainder of the division of those numbers.
